title: Biden to Meet With New York City Mayor Eric Adams to Discuss Crime, Gun Policies
sub_head: A series of high-profile shootings have dominated the mayor’s early weeks in office
body:
WASHINGTON—President Biden intends to travel to New York next week to meet with New York City Mayor Eric Adams as the city grapples with a spate of high-profile police shootings and the nation deals with rising concerns over public safety.
The White House said Mr. Biden’s Feb. 3 appearance with the mayor would focus on the administration’s strategy to fight gun crime, including additional funding for cities and states to put more police officers on the beat, promote community violence intervention programs and target gun traffickers.
